Monologue.Current: “Кто-нибудь, помогите!!!”
Monologue.Original: “Somebody help!!”

Monologue.Current: {Char Quistis}{Line}“Быстрее, {Char Squall}!”
Monologue.Original: Quistis{Line}“Come on, {Char Squall}!”

Monologue.Current: “We meet again.”
Monologue.Original: “We meet again.”

Monologue.Current: “You’re {Char Squall}, huh?{Line} I heard about you.”
Monologue.Original: “You’re {Char Squall}, huh?{Line} I heard about you.”

Monologue.Current: “Is there anything you want?{Line} It’s not free, of course.”
Monologue.Original: “Is there anything you want?{Line} It’s not free, of course.”

Monologue.Current: “Do you need anything?”{Line} You’ll have to pay, of course.”
Monologue.Original: “Do you need anything?”{Line} You’ll have to pay, of course.”

Monologue.Current: Joker{Line}“Do you need anything?”{Line} You’ll have to pay, of course.”
Monologue.Original: Joker{Line}“Do you need anything?”{Line} You’ll have to pay, of course.”

Monologue.Current: “Challenging me to a card game?{Line} ......”{Next}“Sorry, but I don’t play{Line} beginners.{Line} I’ll play you once you{Line} gain more experience.”
Monologue.Original: “Challenging me to a card game?{Line} ......”{Next}“Sorry, but I don’t play{Line} beginners.{Line} I’ll play you once you{Line} gain more experience.”

Monologue.Current: “Hey, heard you’ve been{Line} playing some good games.”{Next}“Sure, you wanna play?”{Next}“What? The CC Group?{Line} Yeah, I’m a member.”{Next}“I’m Card Magician{Line} ‘Joker’.”{Next}“As my name says, I’m the{Line} black sheep of the group.”

Monologue.Current: You need 5 or more{Line}cards to play.
